amendment.description: Amendment creates the Global Clean Energy Exchange Program to strengthen research, educational exchange, and international cooperation with the aim of promoting the development and deployment of clean and efficient energy technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to create the Global Clean Energy Exchange Program a program to strengthen research, educational exchange, and international cooperation with the aim of promoting the development and deployment of clean and efficient energy technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
